ingredients.content: 50 - 100 g Parmesan cheese, crust removed, cut into pieces (3 cm)
6 sprigs fresh parsley, leaves only, plus extra to garnish
½ red capsicum (approx. 110 g) deseeded, cut into pieces
400 g ripe Roma tomatoes, cut into quarters
250 - 300 g dried fettuccine pasta, broken into halves

preparations.content: Place Parmesan cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place brown onion, garlic clove and fresh parsley into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add red capsicum and zucchini and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add olive oil and sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add Roma tomatoes, water, cream and vegetable stock paste and cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.<b>
Add dried fettuccine pasta and salami or chorizo and mix well with spatula to ensure all pasta is completely submerged in the sauce. Cook <b>7-10 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Sprinkle with extra parsley and reserved Parmesan cheese then leave to rest 5 minutes prior to serving.
